section.name: Prepare Plugin - Properties
section.p: The following properties are used by the Prepare Plugin.

tr.td: The top destination directory for all build outputs.

This is the directory where the sources will be copied to before processed. The copy procedure allows for filtering, where the content of the source files have 'tags' in them that will be replaced by build-time information.

A comma-separated list of files that will be filtered. All other files copied will be copied without filtering enabled. All properties will be converted from their typical lower-case format to an upper-case equivalent, and any properties surrounded by the @ character is a tag, that will be replaced by its build value. For instance, @PREPARE.DEST.DIR@ will be replaced by the value of the ${prepare.dest.dir} property, default "target/".
